flavorText:
"It's time to put the 'die' in 'diameter!'"
—Flaky the Irrational
name: Just Desserts
originalText: Just Desserts deals π damage to target creature. (π is the ratio of a circle's circumference to its diameter. (It's a smidgen more than 3.))

rulings.text: One Just Desserts will destroy a creature with toughness 3 or less. Two will destroy a creature with toughness 6 or less. You can take out a creature with 25 toughness with eight of them.
If the damage from Just Desserts gets redirected to a player, use 3.14.
